description: The function is vulnerable to Path Traversal (CWE-22) as it uses user input to access files (filename). An attacker could manipulate the path to access sensitive files. It's also vulnerable to Uncontrolled Resource Consumption (CWE-400) because it reads the entire file into memory which could lead to a denial of service if the file is large. Lastly, it's vulnerable to Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) (CWE-918) as it could be manipulated to send requests to internal resources.
